item.title: N.E.S.T. project
item.description: Logo of the nestbau AG. Photo taken from the nestbau website. Background During my time with the student consultancy InOne Consult e.V. in Tuebingen, I had the chance to work on several exciting projects. Amongst one of them was developing a Social Media Marketing Strategy for a local real estate investment fund. The N.E.S.T.bau AG (short nestbau) plans, builds, and rents out flats in the Tuebingen region under the guidance of ethical principles.
